860470.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Adventurers League: Rrakkma
860470.description:
Dungeons & Dragons: Adventurers League: Rrakkma

You stand before the Sha'sal Khou elders as the most diverse gith hunting party ever assembled.
Are you powerful enough to keep the mind flayers from enslaving your people once again?
Youll have to race across the planes to find out.
A six to eight-hour adventure for six players
Pregenerated 9th level characters provided
This product includes:
  • Six 9th level pregenerated characters
  • 3 unique items
  • 24 images including artwork and full color maps
  • 8 premade encounters (many ready to automatically place NPCs on maps)
  • 29 Action Packed story entries
  • A beautifully rendered reference manual for easy reading
  • and much more!
Some parts of this product require Mordenkainen's Tome of Foes
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software.
Recommended: D&D Basic Rules, D&D Player's Handbook or D&D Character Customization Pack, D&D Monster Manual
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Zacchaeus
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
